query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ma poi che l’altre vergini dier loco 8 a lei di dir, levata dritta in pè, 9 rispuose, colorata come foco:
10 ‘Modicum, et non videbitis me; 11 et iterum, sorelle mie dilette, 12 modicum, et vos videbitis me’.
query.result:
**English:**
7 But after the other virgins gave way 8 to her to speak, standing upright on her feet, 9 she replied, flushed as fire:
10 ‘A little while, and you will not see me; 11 and again, my dear sisters, 12 a little while, and you will see me’.
**Malay:**
7 Tetapi setelah perawan-perawan lainnya memberi tempat 8 kepadanya untuk berbicara, berdiri tegak di atas kakinya, 9 dia menjawab, memerah seperti api:
10 ‘Sebentar lagi, dan kamu tidak akan melihatku; 11 dan sekali lagi, saudari-saudariku terkasih, 12 sebentar lagi, dan kamu akan melihatku’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Poi le si mise innanzi tutte e sette, 14 e dopo sé, solo accennando, mosse 15 me e la donna e ’l savio che ristette.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Then all seven of them placed themselves in front, 14 and after them, with just a gesture, he moved 15 me and the lady and the wise man who stayed behind.
**Malay:**
13 Kemudian ketujuhnya menempatkan diri mereka di depan, 14 dan setelah mereka, hanya dengan isyarat, dia menggerakkan 15 aku dan wanita itu dan orang bijak yang tetap tinggal.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Sì com’ io fui, com’ io dovëa, seco, 23 dissemi: «Frate, perché non t’attenti 24 a domandarmi omai venendo meco?».
query.result:
**English:**
22 Just as I was, just as I had to be with him, 23 he said to me: "Brother, why don't you dare 24 to ask me anything now that you are coming with me?".
**Malay:**
22 Sama seperti aku, sama seperti aku harus bersamanya, 23 katanya kepadaku: "Saudaraku, mengapa kamu tidak berani 24 bertanya kepadaku apa pun sekarang setelah kamu ikut denganku?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Come a color che troppo reverenti 26 dinanzi a suo maggior parlando sono, 27 che non traggon la voce viva ai denti,
28 avvenne a me, che sanza intero suono 29 incominciai: «Madonna, mia bisogna 30 voi conoscete, e ciò ch’ad essa è buono».
query.result:
**English:**
25 Like one who is too reverent 26 in speaking before his superior, 27 so that he does not form the words clearly,
28 it happened to me that, without a full voice, 29 I began: "My Lady, you know my need 30 and what is good for it."
**Malay:**
25 Seperti seseorang yang terlalu hormat 26 ketika berbicara di hadapan atasannya, 27 sehingga dia tidak mengucapkan kata-kata dengan jelas,
28 terjadilah padaku, bahwa tanpa suara yang jelas, 29 aku mulai: "Nyonya, Anda tahu kebutuhanku 30 dan apa yang baik untuk itu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Ed ella a me: «Da tema e da vergogna 32 voglio che tu omai ti disviluppe, 33 sì che non parli più com’ om che sogna.
query.result:
**English:**
31 And she to me: "From fear and from shame 32 I want you now to free yourself, 33 so that you no longer speak like a man who dreams.
**Malay:**
31 Dan dia kepadaku: "Dari rasa takut dan malu 32 aku ingin kamu sekarang membebaskan dirimu, 33 sehingga kamu tidak lagi berbicara seperti orang yang bermimpi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Sappi che ’l vaso che ’l serpente ruppe, 35 fu e non è; ma chi n’ha colpa, creda 36 che vendetta di Dio non teme suppe.
query.result:
**English:**
34 Know that the vessel that the serpent broke, 35 was and is not; but let him who is guilty believe 36 that God's vengeance does not fear bribes.
**Malay:**
34 Ketahuilah bahwa bejana yang dipecahkan oleh ular, 35 ada dan tidak ada; tetapi barangsiapa yang bersalah, percayalah 36 bahwa pembalasan Tuhan tidak takut suap.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Non sarà tutto tempo sanza reda 38 l’aguglia che lasciò le penne al carro, 39 per che divenne mostro e poscia preda;
40 ch’io veggio certamente, e però il narro, 41 a darne tempo già stelle propinque, 42 secure d’ogn’ intoppo e d’ogne sbarro,
43 nel quale un cinquecento diece e cinque, 44 messo di Dio, anciderà la fuia 45 con quel gigante che con lei delinque.
query.result:
**English:**
37 It will not be always thus without relief, 38 the eagle that left its feathers on the chariot, 39 by which it became a monster and then prey;
40 for I see certainly, and therefore I tell it, 41 that propitious stars are already giving us time, 42 secure from every hindrance and every mishap,
43 in which a five hundred, ten and five, 44 a messenger of God, will slay the harlot 45 with that giant who sins with her.
**Malay:**
37 Tidak akan selalu seperti ini tanpa kelegaan, 38 burung elang yang meninggalkan bulunya di kereta, 39 yang dengannya ia menjadi monster dan kemudian menjadi mangsa;
40 karena aku melihat dengan pasti, dan karena itu aku menceritakannya, 41 bahwa bintang-bintang yang menguntungkan sudah memberi kita waktu, 42 aman dari setiap rintangan dan setiap kecelakaan,
43 di mana seorang lima ratus, sepuluh dan lima, 44 utusan Tuhan, akan membunuh pelacur itu 45 dengan raksasa yang berbuat dosa dengannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Tu nota; e sì come da me son porte, 53 così queste parole segna a’ vivi 54 del viver ch’è un correre a la morte.
query.result:
**English:**
52 You understand; and just as they are carried by me, 53 so mark these words to the living 54 of the life that is a race to death.
**Malay:**
52 Kamu mengerti; dan sebagaimana mereka dibawa olehku, 53 maka tandailah kata-kata ini kepada orang-orang yang hidup 54 tentang kehidupan yang merupakan perlombaan menuju kematian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 E aggi a mente, quando tu le scrivi, 56 di non celar qual hai vista la pianta 57 ch’è or due volte dirubata quivi.
query.result:
**English:**
55 And keep in mind, when you write to her, 56 not to conceal what you have seen of the plant 57 that has now been robbed here twice.
**Malay:**
55 Dan ingatlah, ketika kamu menulis kepadanya, 56 untuk tidak menyembunyikan apa yang telah kamu lihat dari tanaman 57 yang sekarang telah dirampok di sini dua kali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Qualunque ruba quella o quella schianta, 59 con bestemmia di fatto offende a Dio, 60 che solo a l’uso suo la creò santa.
query.result:
**English:**
58 Whatever thing that one or the other breaks, 59 with blasphemy of deed offends God, 60 who created it holy for his use alone.
**Malay:**
58 Apa pun yang dirusakkan oleh yang satu atau yang lain, 59 dengan hujatan perbuatan menyinggung Tuhan, 60 yang hanya menciptakannya suci untuk penggunaan-Nya sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Per morder quella, in pena e in disio 62 cinquemilia anni e più l’anima prima 63 bramò colui che ’l morso in sé punio.
query.result:
**English:**
61 To bite into that fruit, in pain and desire, 62 for more than five thousand years the soul 63 yearned for him who punished the bite on himself.
**Malay:**
61 Untuk menggigit buah itu, dalam kesakitan dan keinginan, 62 selama lebih dari lima ribu tahun jiwa 63 merindukan dia yang menghukum gigitan itu pada dirinya sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Dorme lo ’ngegno tuo, se non estima 65 per singular cagione esser eccelsa 66 lei tanto e sì travolta ne la cima.
query.result:
**English:**
64 Your intellect is asleep, if it does not perceive 65 that she is so high and so turned at the top 66 for a singular reason.
**Malay:**
64 Akal budimu sedang tidur, jika tidak menyadari 65 bahwa dia begitu tinggi dan begitu berputar di puncaknya 66 karena alasan yang tunggal.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 E se stati non fossero acqua d’Elsa 68 li pensier vani intorno a la tua mente, 69 e ’l piacer loro un Piramo a la gelsa,
70 per tante circostanze solamente 71 la giustizia di Dio, ne l’interdetto, 72 conosceresti a l’arbor moralmente.
query.result:
**English:**
67 And if the thoughts that go around your mind 68 were not water from the Elsa, 69 and their pleasure a Pyramus to the mulberry,
70 through so many circumstances alone 71 the justice of God, in the interdict, 72 you would recognize morally in the tree.
**Malay:**
67 Dan jika pikiran-pikiran yang berkeliaran di benakmu 68 bukanlah air dari Elsa, 69 dan kesenangan mereka adalah Pyramus bagi pohon mulberry,
70 melalui begitu banyak keadaan saja 71 keadilan Tuhan, dalam larangan, 72 Anda akan mengenal secara moral di pohon itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Ma perch’ io veggio te ne lo ’ntelletto 74 fatto di pietra e, impetrato, tinto, 75 sì che t’abbaglia il lume del mio detto,
76 voglio anco, e se non scritto, almen dipinto, 77 che ’l te ne porti dentro a te per quello 78 che si reca il bordon di palma cinto».
query.result:
**English:**
73 But because I see your intellect 74 made of stone and, hardened, dyed, 75 so that the light of my words dazzles you,
76 I also want, and if not written, at least painted, 77 that you carry it within you for that 78 for which the staff is carried, bound with palm.
**Malay:**
73 Tetapi karena aku melihat intelekmu 74 terbuat dari batu dan, mengeras, ternoda, 75 sehingga cahaya perkataanku menyilaukanmu,
76 Aku juga ingin, dan jika tidak tertulis, setidaknya dilukis, 77 bahwa kamu membawanya di dalam dirimu untuk itu 78 yang tongkat itu dibawa, diikat dengan telapak tangan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 E io: «Sì come cera da suggello, 80 che la figura impressa non trasmuta, 81 segnato è or da voi lo mio cervello.
query.result:
**English:**
79 And I: "Yes, as wax from a seal, 80 which does not change the imprinted figure, 81 my brain is now marked by you.
**Malay:**
79 Dan aku: "Ya, seperti lilin dari meterai, 80 yang tidak mengubah figur yang tercetak, 81 otakku sekarang ditandai olehmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Ma perché tanto sovra mia veduta 83 vostra parola disïata vola, 84 che più la perde quanto più s’aiuta?».
query.result:
**English:**
82 But why does your desired speech fly so high above my understanding, 83 that the more it tries to help, the more it loses me?
**Malay:**
82 Tetapi mengapa ucapanmu yang diinginkan terbang begitu tinggi di atas pemahamanku, 83 sehingga semakin ia mencoba membantu, semakin ia membuatku bingung?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Ond’ io rispuosi lei: «Non mi ricorda 92 ch’i’ stranïasse me già mai da voi, 93 né honne coscïenza che rimorda».
query.result:
**English:**
91 Then I answered her: "I do not recall 92 that I ever separated myself from you, 93 nor is there any conscience that troubles me".
**Malay:**
91 Lalu aku menjawabnya: "Aku tidak ingat 92 bahwa aku pernah menjauhkan diriku darimu, 93 atau ada hati nurani yang menggangguku".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Veramente oramai saranno nude 101 le mie parole, quanto converrassi 102 quelle scovrire a la tua vista rude».
query.result:
**English:**
100 Truly my words will now be bare, 101 as much as it would suit you 102 to reveal them to your unrefined sight.
**Malay:**
100 Sungguh kata-kataku sekarang akan telanjang, 101 sebagaimana layaknya bagimu 102 untuk mengungkapkannya kepada pandanganmu yang kasar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 E più corusco e con più lenti passi 104 teneva il sole il cerchio di merigge, 105 che qua e là, come li aspetti, fassi,
106 quando s’affisser, sì come s’affigge 107 chi va dinanzi a gente per iscorta 108 se trova novitate o sue vestigge,
109 le sette donne al fin d’un’ombra smorta, 110 qual sotto foglie verdi e rami nigri 111 sovra suoi freddi rivi l’alpe porta.
query.result:
**English:**
103 And more radiant and with slower steps 104 the sun held the circle of midday, 105 which here and there, as you look at it, forms,
106 when they stopped, just as one stops 107 who goes in front of people as a guide 108 if he finds something new or traces of it,
109 the seven ladies at the end of a faint shadow, 110 like that which the Alps bear over their cold streams 111 under green leaves and dark branches.
**Malay:**
103 Dan lebih berseri dan dengan langkah yang lebih lambat 104 matahari menahan lingkaran tengah hari, 105 yang di sana-sini, seperti yang Anda lihat, terbentuk,
106 ketika mereka berhenti, sama seperti seseorang berhenti 107 yang berjalan di depan orang-orang sebagai pemandu 108 jika dia menemukan sesuatu yang baru atau jejaknya,
109 ketujuh wanita itu di ujung bayangan yang samar, 110 seperti yang dibawa oleh Pegunungan Alpen di atas sungai-sungai dingin mereka 111 di bawah dedaunan hijau dan cabang-cabang gelap.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Dinanzi ad esse Ëufratès e Tigri 113 veder mi parve uscir d’una fontana, 114 e, quasi amici, dipartirsi pigri.
query.result:
**English:**
112 Before them the Euphrates and Tigris 113 seemed to me to issue from one source, 114 and, like friends, to part lazily.
**Malay:**
112 Di hadapan mereka Sungai Efrat dan Tigris 113 tampak olehku keluar dari satu mata air, 114 dan, bagai sahabat, berpisah dengan malas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 «O luce, o gloria de la gente umana, 116 che acqua è questa che qui si dispiega 117 da un principio e sé da sé lontana?».
query.result:
**English:**
115 "O light, O glory of the human race, 116 what is this water that here unfolds 117 from a single source and yet is far from itself?".
**Malay:**
115 "Wahai cahaya, wahai kemuliaan umat manusia, 116 apakah air ini yang di sini terbentang 117 dari satu sumber dan namun jauh dari dirinya sendiri?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Per cotal priego detto mi fu: «Priega 119 Matelda che ’l ti dica». E qui rispuose, 120 come fa chi da colpa si dislega,
121 la bella donna: «Questo e altre cose 122 dette li son per me; e son sicura 123 che l’acqua di Letè non gliel nascose».
query.result:
**English:**
118 Because of such a prayer it was said to me: "Pray 119 to Matelda that she may tell it to you." And here she replied, 120 as one who frees herself from blame,
121 the beautiful lady: "This and other things 122 were told to him by me; and I am certain 123 that the water of Lethe did not hide them from him."
**Malay:**
118 Kerana doa sedemikian itu dikatakan kepadaku: "Doakanlah 119 Matelda agar dia memberitahumu." Dan di sini dia menjawab, 120 seperti orang yang membebaskan dirinya dari kesalahan,
121 wanita cantik itu: "Ini dan hal-hal lainnya 122 telah diberitahukan kepadanya olehku; dan aku yakin 123 bahwa air Lethe tidak menyembunyikannya darinya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 E Bëatrice: «Forse maggior cura, 125 che spesse volte la memoria priva, 126 fatt’ ha la mente sua ne li occhi oscura.
query.result:
**English:**
124 And Beatrice: "Perhaps a greater care, 125 which often deprives the memory, 126 has made his mind dark in his eyes.
**Malay:**
124 Dan Beatrice: "Mungkin perhatian yang lebih besar, 125 yang sering kali menghilangkan ingatan, 126 telah membuat pikirannya gelap di matanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Ma vedi Eünoè che là diriva: 128 menalo ad esso, e come tu se’ usa, 129 la tramortita sua virtù ravviva».
query.result:
**English:**
127 But see Eunoë which flows there: 128 go to it, and as you are accustomed, 129 revive your fainting virtue with it.
**Malay:**
127 Tetapi lihatlah Eunoë yang mengalir di sana: 128 pergilah ke sana, dan seperti kebiasaanmu, 129 hidupkan kembali kebajikanmu yang lemah dengannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 Io ritornai da la santissima onda 143 rifatto sì come piante novelle 144 rinovellate di novella fronda,
145 puro e disposto a salire a le stelle.
query.result:
**English:**
142 I returned from the most holy wave 143 remade like new plants 144 renewed with new leaves,
145 pure and ready to ascend to the stars.
**Malay:**
142 Aku kembali dari ombak yang paling suci 143 terlahir kembali seperti tanaman baru 144 diperbarui dengan dedaunan baru,
145 murni dan siap untuk naik ke bintang-bintang.
